name: Necromancer Siege
description:
Defend against knights attacking your base by using:

Skeleton Archers, a simple archer looking for blood

Fire Wizards, a wizard that shoots fireballs that explode on impact

Ice Mages, a mage that shoots beams of ice that slows unwanted enemies from approaching

Team:

Art - Evilpixi - https://itch.io/profile/evilpixi

Programming - Ryhime - Ryhime - itch.io

Music - Prod Marrow - https://prodmarrow.itch.io/
